mapper.sql: UNIQUE_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_CODE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, GROUP_ID, GROUP_TYPE, VALIDATE_FLAG, REASON_CODE
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into MM_MEMBER_LIST (UNIQUE_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_CODE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, GROUP_ID, GROUP_TYPE, VALIDATE_FLAG, REASON_CODE ) values (#{uniqueId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -1, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual

mapper.update:
update MM_MEMBER_LIST
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GROUP_TYPE = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDATE_FLAG = #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON_CODE = #{reasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update MM_MEMBER_LIST set MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GROUP_TYPE = #{groupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDATE_FLAG = #{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON_CODE = #{reasonCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UNIQUE_ID = #{uniqueId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from MM_MEMBER_LIST where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and VALIDATE_FLAG = 'Y'

select mmv.member_id,mmv.member_name,mmv.member_code,mmv.email,mmv.phone_no,mmv.status from MM_MEMBER_LIST mml, mm_member_v mmv where mml.member_id = mmv.member_id and GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
